ModMetaData.name: ARSENAL: Autonomous Missile Logistics
ModMetaData.author: YourName
ModMetaData.description:
A sophisticated cruise missile logistics system featuring autonomous global delivery.
Features: - ARSENAL: Automated manufacturing facility that produces cruise missiles - HUB: Staging platforms for vertical missile storage and launch - HOP: Refueling stations for extended range operations - Autonomous routing: Missiles automatically navigate to undersupplied HUBs - Global strike capability: Launch precision strikes from strategically positioned HUBs
The missiles intelligently path through HOP refueling stations to achieve true global reach.
